alert.note: Alert for Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 10:10PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Logan and southwestern Payne Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1010 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crescent, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Langston, Crescent, Cashion, Cedar Valley, Mulhall, Cimarron City, and Orlando. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 160 and 177. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
